Morningside Panthers AFC 2009 Premiership Reunion

"Insert Date Here"

2009 Premiership

In what was a repeat of the 2003 Premiership decider, red hot favourites Morningside took on the fast-finishing Mount Gravatt in the battle of Brisbane's South-East. Both clubs entered with that winning feel about them with neither having lost in the previous two months to September 2009. Morningside entered fresh and desperate to amend for the previous years fade out.

3 Course All Inclusive Formal Event

Proudly Sponsored by BMC Capital Investments

Join in what promises to be a fantastic get together to celebrate the trails and tribulations of the 2009 AFLQ Premiership Season. Hosted by Morningside Panther's very own Prince of Banter, Shaun Mugavin from Club Star Entertainment, at the Ritzy surrounds of "" in the Brisbane CBD. Get ready to relive all the action and excitement of the big day for both Senior and Reserve Grade teams. Ticket includes preshipped merchandise including a copy of each respective games, a pack of playing cards of each team member and coaching staff and other possibilities for purchase on the night.
